title: Pedestal
description: Pedestal; Attributed to André-Charles Boulle (French, 1642 - 1732, master before 1666); Paris, France; about 1700; Fir, oak and walnut veneered with ebony, dyed fruit wood (probably pear) brass and tortoise shell; gilt bronze mounts; 121.1 x 55.6 x 55.6 cm (47 11/16 x 21 7/8 x 21 7/8 in.); 88.DA.75.1; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
